item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An alternative idea for a typed language living alongside/inside JavaScript (14 points | 7 comments)
2. PSA: SQLite does not do checksums (15 points | 17 comments)
3. Regular Restarts Are Good, Actually (26 points | 7 comments)

5. A mental model for Linux file, hard and soft links (11 points | 5 comments)
6. Unused keys in vim (12 points | no comments)
7. When Machine Learning Tells the Wrong Story (6 points | 1 comment)
8. Visualizing local election results with Datasette, Observable and MapLibre GL (1 points | no comments)
9. Everything I've learned so far about running local LLMs (2 points | 2 comments)
10. The Pythonic Emptiness (1 points | no comments)
11. Building Bridges to C++ (19 points | 28 comments)
12. The BPF instruction set architecture is now RFC 9669 (10 points | no comments)
13. Everybody Codes (2 points | no comments)
14. RISC-V Vector Extension overview (3 points | no comments)
15. Discussion: Adding memory regions to Go (18 points | no comments)
16. Safety in TigerBeetle (1 points | 1 comment)
17. Using Nix to Fuzz Test a PDF Parser (Part Two) (1 points | no comments)
18. Algol 68 – A Retrospective (3 points | 1 comment)

20. GenMC: Model checking for concurrent C programs (2 points | 1 comment)
21. Tone of Life (31 points | 2 comments)
22. Known Attacks On Elliptic Curve Cryptography (39 points | 4 comments)
23. How to self-host all of Bluesky (except the AppView (for now)) (40 points | 33 comments)
24. Debian GSoC 2024 Final Reports (8 points | 1 comment)
25. Algol-68 seemed like a good idea – until it wasn’t (11 points | 11 comments)
